Package com.golden.gamedev.funbox

Provides miscellanous classes to enhance the game creation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ErrorNotificationDialog ErrorNotificationDialog class is a dialog UI to show the player the game exception and tell the player to send it to the game author.
GameSettings GameSettings is a dialog UI to show the user the basic game options for the player to choose of.
KeyCapture KeyCapture is a utility to capture key sequence combination, usually used to turn on cheat mode.
LibInfo Class to inform beginner GTGE users that GTGE is a library, thus it can't be run by double clicking it like a normal application, GTGE does not have any GUI/form/frame.
 

Package com.golden.gamedev.funbox Description

Provides miscellanous classes to enhance the game creation.
